answers.answer: Hello!Wear proper footwear and take NSAIDs or pain killers intermittently.Also apply ice packs and rest for couple of days if the pain is intense to decrease the inflammation.If the pain continues you would need an X-ray and an examination near an orthopedician.There are many reasons: injuries, faulty foot wear, lumbar spine problems, soft tissue injuries, diabetes, nerve related issues etc.Take care!
